com.ericdaugherty.lib.service
Class EjbSessionFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ericdaugherty.lib.service.EjbSessionFactory
public class EjbSessionFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a mechanism to cache and lookup EJB Stateless SessionBeans Local and Remote interfaces.

Method Detail

lookupInterface

public static java.lang.Object lookupInterface(java.lang.String homeJndiName,
                                               java.lang.Class homeClass)
                                        throws SystemException
Retrieves the specified EJB Local/Remote interface.
Parameters:
jndiName - the name to use to lookup this object in the JNDI Tree.
Local/Remote - class used in the PortableRemoteObject.narror call after the lookup.
Returns:
Local/Remote interface.

getInstance

private static EjbSessionFactory getInstance()
                                      throws SystemException
Returns the singleton instance of this class. If the instance has not yet been created, a new instance is created and returned.
Returns:
the EjbHomeFactory singleton instance

createRemote

private static final java.lang.Object createRemote(java.lang.Object home)
                                            throws SystemException
Creates a new Remote interface from the Home Interface passed to this method using reflection. This method assumes a create method with no parameters exists on the Home Interface.
Parameters:
home - the EJBHome(or EjbLocalHome) interface to use to create the Remote Interface.
Returns:
the Remote Interface
Throws:
SystemException - thrown when an error occurs performing the call to the create() method on the Home Interface.
